Compatibility Mode
 Try this if this app is not working although your phone has a LED Flash.

 Force Display Light
 Use this mode if your phone does NOT have a LED Flash.

 Bugs and Suggestions
 Have you found a bug?
 Do you have any suggestions?
 Send me an E-Mail at:
 me@stefanfabian.me
Is it working or shall we try the compatibility mode?
Is it working now?\nIf it is still not working and you do have a flashlight please contact me and tell me what phone you\'re using.\nYou can use the display as lightsource if you want.
